text: Kotava is an international auxiliary language (IAL). It focuses especially on the idea of cultural neutrality. The name means "the language of one and all". The Kotava community has put into use the saying "a project humanistic and universal, utopian and realistic". The language is mainly known in French- speaking countries and most learning materials for it are in French. == Other websites == *Official site (in French; autotranslated to other languages) Category:Constructed languages
title: Kotava
